title: Mephit
content:
Hello! I followed my web stats back here from my ambigram page, and it's reawakened old passions of mine (I've been spending most of my time and creativity on comics). So I did this. Let me know what you think. Nonalphabetics to come later.   
   
 ![Mephit Black, Mephit Stripe](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418190348im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/18916.gif)
author: cerulean
